title: Turkus Titeenit 2023
description: Turkus Titeenit 2023 - main event of the year for computer engineering students
heading: <1>Titeenit</1> in Turku
event-info-text: The most anticipated event of the year for IT students
event-info-text-2: A weekend full of competing, networking and fun. Come and join!
info_content:
Titeenit, or the Battle of the Titens, is an event that brings together all the information technology guilds in Finland. Titeenit are held in a different city every year, and this year Turku has the honor of hosting the event. 
 The weekend will kick off on Friday with a day of hanging out and getting to know each other. The main event, however, will be Saturday's Titeeni-events, where the IT- towns will compete against each other in the most tricky competitions. There will be one judge from each city, who will decide on the distribution of points. At the end of the day, the winner of the 2023 Battle of Titens will be announced!
online_challenge_md:
Fight against other guilds in YO-Village and grind your guild to the top of the leaderboard! 
 The aim of the game is to find the hidden Gambit, African Star style. There are 10 lobbies, and each lobby is limited to one from each guild. 
 There are buffs, nerfs, random XP to be given away in the lobbies, including: 
 - electric bikes 
 - sausage roasting 
 - bus 

 So look out for other guilds when you bump into them IRL! 
 Join the game through the link: 
 ### [KGM - Online challenge](https://peli.titeen.it/)
